content:
I am sorry that I do not understand your question.

Do you mean that you transferred the settings of Thunderbird for desktop to Thunderbird for Android by using QR code, and your gmail account appears in Thunderbird for Android, but the emails in gmail account does not appear in Thunderbird for Android?

Does gmail account in Thunderbird for desktop use IMAP or use POP?

Does gmail account in Thunderbird for Android use IMAP or use POP?
creator: Yu5tiqX9og

content: Ray, questions for you above. Need your reply. Thanks.
creator: wsmwk

content:
The following steps might be helpful:

1. "Settings" > "Accounts" section > tap the account you want to configure > "Folders" > untick "Show only subscribed folders".

2. "Manage folders" (which appears in your screenshot) > tap the folder you want to configure > enable "Show folder".
creator: Yu5tiqX9og

content: jak importowaÄ‡ kontakty z komputera do androida ?
creator: jurkiewiczartur91

content:
Thunderbird for Android does not have contacts of its own, and it uses the contacts of your Android phone.

The following link might be helpful: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1484999#answer-1702948
creator: Yu5tiqX9og

content: The following steps might be helpful: 1. "Settings" > "Accounts" section > tap the account you want to configure > "Sending mail". 2. Use either of the following steps: 2.1. (In "Sending mail") "Composition defaults" > change the value of "Your name" field. 2.2. (In "Sending mail") "Manage identities" > tap the identity you want to configure > change the value of "Your name" field.
creator: Yu5tiqX9og
